events.description: The club brings the joy of social partner dancing to UNLV through tango and salsa classes, social dance events, and performances. All skill levels are welcome in a safe and friendly environment.

events.eventName: Argentine Tango Class (UNLV Tango Salsa Club)
events.description: Weekly Argentine Tango classes focused on fostering connection and creativity through nonverbal communication. No dance experience required - just bring socks and a smile.

IEEE members will run a booth with hands-on experiments to expose Girl Scouts to science and engineering concepts.

Open practice for the UNLV Women's Lacrosse team welcoming all interested players regardless of experience level. Team prepares for spring season with fall practices.
